verbs.description: [ARG0: First lady Melania Trump 's spokesperson] [V: says] [ARG1: the Secret Service has been contacted over actor Peter Fonda 's call for Barron Trump to be taken away from his parents . What 's the background ? On Wednesday , Fonda went on an explicit , expletive - laden rant against the Trumps , suggesting that Barron should be removed from his family home and put into a cage with pedophiles . Fonda apparently made the remarks with regard to the migrant children crisis at the U.S .- Mexico border . On Twitter , Fonda wrote , " We should rip Barron Trump from his mother ’s arms and put him in a cage with pedophiles and see if mother will stand up against the giant a**hole she is married to . 90 million people in the streets on the same weekend in the country . F***. ” The tweet has since been removed , but not before it sparked major outrage from conservatives and liberals alike . Fonda also suggested that Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents ' children be targeted for] …
